description: This dashboard uses the system metrics collected from the `hostmetrics` receiver to show CPU, Memory, Disk, Network and Filesystem usage
title: Host Metrics

251c0d09-804b-46fa-b3bf-6498251a53b1.description: The name of the host machine
251c0d09-804b-46fa-b3bf-6498251a53b1.name: host_name
251c0d09-804b-46fa-b3bf-6498251a53b1.queryValue:
SELECT JSONExtractString(labels, 'host_name') AS host_name
FROM signoz_metrics.distributed_time_series_v4_1day
WHERE metric_name = 'system_cpu_time'
GROUP BY host_name

widgets.description: The queue size of pending I/O operations.
widgets.title: Queue size
